alert.note: Alert for Boone; McHenry; Winnebago (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 17 at 5:22AM CDT until August 17 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Winnebago County in north central Illinois... Northwestern McHenry County in northeastern Illinois... Northern Boone County in north central Illinois... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 522 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Beloit, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Beloit, Roscoe, Harvard, South Beloit, Rockton, Poplar Grove, Sharon, Capron, Hebron and Chemung. Including the following interstate... I-90 between mile markers 0 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
